title: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: When using the SaveAs functionality, the file type is being forgotten. Additionally, the icon has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When saving a file using SaveAs, the file is being saved as a generic file and the icon has changed to a generic file icon. When I try to open the file, it is opened as plain text.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless I explicitly change it. The icon should remain unchanged as well.
SR:
1. Open a file in the application.
2. Click on the SaveAs option in the file menu.
3. Choose a different location to save the file.
4. Verify that the file is saved with the same extension as the original file.
5. Open the saved file and confirm that it retains its original file type and the icon is not changed.
